channel.title: Client crash wtf?
channel.description:
ok i dont know what happened but heres the error :[
[code=javascript]RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4410 at client.method101(client.java:7778) at client.method96(client.java:7511) at client.method114(client.java:8882) at client.method62(client.java:3033) at client.method7(client.java:2071) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:119) at client.run(client.java:4487) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Client crash wtf?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

You’ve tried to access the 4410th element in an array who’s length is < 4410. The exception was thrown by method101 in client class on line 7778.

Read full topic
